butterflybot.title: Mechanical Butterfly
butterflybot.description: Hextech can be fun! This toy butterfly will keep you entertained for hours of fun.

Atlas_Gauntlets.title: Atlas Gauntlets
Atlas_Gauntlets.description: Our Atlas Gauntlets are vital for letting miners in the Fissures perform their duties safely and efficiently.

hexgatecloseup.title: Hexgate
hexgatecloseup.description: Hexgates make long distance travel more accessible than ever. Blink straight to your destination!

hexbow.title: Hex Bow
hexbow.description: Hunting bows augmented with Hextech for maximum power and efficiency!

hexcore.title: Hex Core
hexcore.description: The Hexcore: a myseterious rune matrix discovered by none other than Jayce Talis himself!

caliver.title: Hexlyene Caliver
caliver.description: Hextech has military potential! Introducing the Hexlyene Caliver.

orb.title: Hextech Gemstone
orb.description: Hextech Gemstones have been refined to increase their stability as a power source.

hexwheel.title: Hex Wheel
hexwheel.description: The Hexwheel was an early experimental method of Hextech transportation.

hexgateinterior.title: Hexgate Interior
hexgateinterior.description: A look behind the curtain on the navigation technology that powers our Hexgates
